value:
The Hall of Forms awaits your
challenge!

The Vault of Heaven (Tier 31+):
These are the highest tiers.

If you end the season on Tier 27
or Tier 28, you will enter the Vault
of Heaven and you will start the
following season with a Lift of
18,000 (Tier 31). (Starting with
the season that begins Jan 12.)

Vault of Heaven at Season's End:
Based on your results during
a season, one of the following
will occur:
・ Tier 37 or lower → Tier 23
・ Tier 38 or higher → Tier 31

Rules in the Vault of Heaven:
・ All Allies Survive Bonus
    If you win with all allies alive,
    you will get +10 to your Lift.
